channel.title: Error 'COMPASS POINTS!' -- Look please --
channel.description:
Okay each time and every day im getting one step closer getting my SCAR script finished and completed! Today, i ran it and it, changed the chat options... walked to the flax field... and then this error came up in SCAR...
YAY FOR CRACKED SHITTY SCRIPTS!!!!
BankColor:4242656 ; TreeColor:28672 ; FlaxColor:12631128 ; 0 Error detecting Compass Angle. 0 Error detecting Compass Angle. 0 Error detecting Compass Angle. Successfully executed
As u can see the first part worked. ... . . . . .Then.. it clicks the 'Inventory' Icon, and then clicks the most top left corner of the runescape screen... and keeps on doing that.... i havent tried runnning it on from there, but thats what i have so far, so can sum1 help me with this?

item.title: Error 'COMPASS POINTS!' -- Look please --
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Can you post the script, because that helps a bit. Or atleast post the part what it does after checking the flax color.

Read full topic
